This is my import procedure
```{r}
library(readxl)
url <- "https://github.com/philbowsher/Foundation-of-the-R-Workflow-workshop-2019-09-06/raw/master/Examples/data/ad_treatment.xlsx"
destfile <- "ad_treatment.xlsx"
curl::curl_download(url, destfile)
ad_treatment <- read_excel(destfile)


ad_treatment
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
libary(readx1)
```






Graph

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

phil <- ggplot(data = diamonds, 
            aes(x = cut, fill = clarity)) +
    geom_bar(position = "dodge")

phil


ggplotly(phil)

```


```{r}
ad_treatment%>%
  filter(age>=80L & age<= 85L)%>%
  filter(mmse >=15 & mmse <=
           28.8)%>&
  ggplot()+
  aes()
```



```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(ad_treatment) +
 aes(x = drug_treatment, y = sex, fill = health_status) +
 geom_boxplot() +
 scale_fill_hue() +
 theme_minimal()
```
